name: SCNPhysicsVehicleWheel
desc: The appearance and physical characteristics of an individual wheel associated with an physics vehicle behavior.

items.name: var connectionPosition: SCNVector3
items.desc: The position of the wheel’s connection to the vehicle’s chassis.

items.name: var axle: SCNVector3
items.desc: The direction of the axis that the wheel spins around to move the vehicle.

items.name: var steeringAxis: SCNVector3
items.desc: The direction of the axis that the wheel pivots around to steer the vehicle.

items.name: var frictionSlip: CGFloat
items.desc: The traction between the wheel and any surface in contact with it.

items.name: var suspensionStiffness: CGFloat
items.desc: The spring coefficient of the suspension between the vehicle and the wheel.

items.name: var suspensionCompression: CGFloat
items.desc: The coefficient that limits the speed of the suspension returning to its rest length when compressed.

items.name: var suspensionDamping: CGFloat
items.desc: The damping ratio that limits oscillation in the vehicle’s suspension.

items.name: var maximumSuspensionTravel: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum distance that the wheel is allowed to move up or down relative to its connection point, in centimeters.

items.name: var maximumSuspensionForce: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum force of the suspension between the vehicle and the wheel, in newtons.

items.name: var suspensionRestLength: CGFloat
items.desc: The resting length of the suspension, in meters.

items.name: var node: SCNNode
items.desc: The node providing the wheel’s visual representation.
